name: stl-to-mesh
description: STL to Point Mesh converter using WebAssembly and Three.js

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:toolpath && npm run build:web
scripts.build:wasm: emcc src/wasm/mesh-converter.c -o build/mesh-converter.wasm -s WASM=1 -s STANDALONE_WASM -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_convert_to_point_mesh","_get_bounds","_free_output","_malloc","_free","_test_triangle_data"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -O3 --no-entry
scripts.build:toolpath: emcc src/wasm/toolpath-generator.c -o build/toolpath-generator.wasm -s WASM=1 -s STANDALONE_WASM -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_create_terrain_map","_create_tool_map","_generate_path","_generate_path_partial","_get_path_dimensions","_copy_path_data","_get_map_dimensions","_get_sparse_tool_count","_free_height_map","_free_toolpath","_malloc","_free"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -O3 --no-entry
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve build
scripts.test:native: gcc -I src/wasm src/test/test-converter-new.c src/wasm/mesh-converter-lib.c -o test-converter-new -lm -O2 && ./test-converter-new benchmark/fixtures/inner.stl 0.1
scripts.test: npm run test:native && npm run test:wasm
